thread.section_title: Greyhours Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greyhours | greyhours.com
thread.title: Victoria Thirakul

author: Victoria Thirakul
title: Victoria Thirakul
text: I've just bought a Grey hours watch for my husband and I have to say that this Watch is the best value for money accessory I've ever bought. First of all, I've received it in a very nice packaging at home few days after I've ordered it. It came with a complimentary interchangeable bracelet, a certificate of authenticity, and a nice leather pouch to put the watch when I don't use it. The presentation and quality of packaging worth the ones from the Swiss horloger. The watch itself is very pure, chic and elegant. My husband wears it regularly to go to the office, or casually and is thrilled with it! I highly recommend for upcoming birthdays or valentines gifts !
